name: 3D Maze Logic Ball
description: 3D Maze Logic Ball is a 3D maze game where your goal is to guide the ball into the black hole on a 3D classic maze board by simply tilting the wood board using your device. The ball has to get into the black hole goals to complete the mission and to continue to play on another level. This is a great challenge for all! A game of skill and dexterity! Play with beautiful 3D graphic effects and nice music. You can also save and share your final result on the labyrinth. Do not miss our fun brain game with logic and strategy.
